snippet: If you are looking for great apps for babies and toddlers, don't confine yourself to apps for that age group. Several apps for older children, adults and even cats could be hits.
abstract: If you are looking for great apps for babies and toddlers, don't confine yourself to apps for that age group. Several apps for older children, adults and even cats could be hits.

headline.main: App Smart Extra: Cat Apps Work for Babies
